name: Doge The Cars!
description:
A simple game to relax yourself. Try and get as much score as possible.

How much score can you get. A simple game in which you doge the other cars on the road, kinda infinitely. You may also get a power up, to shoot the other cars out of existence.

Have Fun and do leave your suggestions in the comments.

PS. This is the mobile version of the game. The PC version will be uploaded soon
